name: Shugajo
description: The perfectionist of the Shugafam, this fastidious fellow values precision and detail above all else. It follows that the Shugajo is the namesake of an instrument that requires a finely-honed technique. The secret to its success? Soothing daily mudbaths, which keep the mind clear and the limbs limber (and tinted a rich, chocolatey brown).
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 11 hr, Enhanced Time: 1 day 2 hr 15 min
